article.name: Write your name in Phoenician
article.description:
This is a little tool I wrote based off an information board I found at the Ancient city of Byblos (near Beruit) in Lebanon.
The letters (both Arabic and Phoenician) were traced from photos then I created a simple onscreen keyboard where the user presses letters to add them to a word on the stage.
This completes the mini-game section of the 2006 Mediterranean Cruise photo album that I put together just after Easter 2006.
article.keywords: phoenician alphabet write your name flash arabic traced photos tool information board lebanon ancient city byblos
